contents.label: Pick simple mix-and-match pieces to avoid overpacking
contents.details: Did you know that just 3 bottoms (pants, shorts, skirt, etc.), 4 tops (tee, tank, etc.), and 2 outer layers (sweater, coat, or cardigan) can make up to 24 different outfits?

contents.label: Utilize shoe space when you can
contents.details: Rolled-up socks, belts, gloves or other small items can easily fit into shoes. This also helps the shoe hold its shape throughout your travels.

contents.label: Consider packing cubes and compression sacks
contents.details: besides saving considerable space, they can protect clothing from grime and spillages
